job.description: Your Opportunity  We are looking for a curious, optimistic, and innovative data scientist who takes initiative to solve problems that help our clients and one another succeed. Our large client base and multi-channel transaction volume offers a fertile data environment to build models, discover new insights, and guide decision-making at Schwab.  Data Science is an enterprise team within the Data, Analytics, and Insight (DAI) organization that builds models and provides advanced analytical support across all business units including retail, institutional, marketing, digital, and operations. Our data scientists collaborate directly with business, product, technology, and other analytical teams in DAI to solve complex business problems by building state-of-the-art models and tools to grow the business, streamline costs, and improve customer experiences.
